subtitle: Lamb and apricot go together well. This dish is an all-in-one recipe.

method.text: Melt the butter in a large casserole. Add the lamb and fry for 3-5 min or until well browned. Transfer to a dish and keep warm.
Add the onions and garlic to the pan and fry for 2-3 min until softened. Return the lamb to the pan. Stir in the flour and cook for 1 min.
Gradually stir in the stock, stirring constantly until all is incorporated. Season to taste. Stir in the cinnamon, raisins, apricots and potato halves.
Bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 40-50 min or until Iamb and potatoes are tender. Sprinkle over the basil and serve.

title: Lamb and apricot ragout
